Pull in external scripts into existing code chunks

from:  https://stackoverflow.com/questions/14796501/is-it-possible-to-call-external-r-script-from-r-markdown-rmd-in-rstudio


```{r setup, echo=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, cache=FALSE)
knitr::read_chunk('src/example_starwars.R')
```
